name: CROQUETTE LEAGUE
description:
Battle your feline friends in local coop, and keep the ball with your colors for the longest period of time. 

CONTROLS : 

GAMEPAD : Right Trigger to run, B to jump, Y to change the camera focus. 

KEYBOARD : ARROW KEYS to run, right Ctrl to jump, right Alt to Change the camera mode.

VR and MMORPG options available after our 1M$-goal Kickstarter.

CREDITS :
